sentences.en: Emperor very angry, he call person any lift to tie up and drag out to behead.
sentences.cn: 皇帝非常生气, 他就叫人把阿凡提绑起来,拉出去杀头.

sentences.en: He ordered to behead the two leaders.
sentences.cn: 他下令将两个队长斩首.

sentences.en: It needed only a fraction of a second to behead him.
sentences.cn: 砍去他的脑袋只要短短的一瞬.

sentences.en: Some day, with additional two capital punishment a ask behead.
sentences.cn: 某日, 与另两位死刑犯一道问斩.

sentences.en: Take him out and behead him!
We may have more '' passes " to go through and more '' enemy generals " to behead.
sentences.cn: 我们可能比 关公 还要过更多的 “ 关”,斩更多的 “ 将”.

words.tran_cn: 把…砍首（behead的现在分词形式）
